title: Nginx
content:
Nginx
===

- `nginx`
- `nginx -s stop`
- `nginx -s reload`
- 查看进程
  - `ps -ef |grep nginx`
- 平滑重启
  - `kill -HUP [nginx pid(上一条所得)]`
- 重启防火墙
  - `sudo vim /etc/sysconfig/iptabels`
  - `-A INPUT -p -tcp -m state --state NEW -m tcp --dprod 80 -j ACCEPT`
  - :wq
  - 重启防火墙`sudo service iptables restart`
- nginx配置文件路径:
  - `/usr/local/etc/nginx`
